title: "Researchers identify subtype of depression using surveys, cognitive tests, and brain imaging"
excerpt: "Scientists at Stanford Medicine conducted a study describing a new category of depression—labeled the cognitive biotype—which accounts for 27% of depressed patients and is not effectively treated by commonly prescribed antidepressants."
